name: Kick Dicer
description:
Kick Dicer is a fast paced retro shooter where you kill dices by shooting them or by smashing them into one another with math!

Kick two dices who's life total's sum is equal to number of faces they have and they EXPLODE!

If you manage to do it with the same number on both faces, you get and HEALTH PACK! (which you will need because this is kinda of a hard game)
